title: Sampler, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in counted cross stitches on plain weave fountation
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Donor's Notes: "From Easton, PA. Gift of Sylvester Fraser."
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: An unusually wide rectangular sampler, with alphabets in which each letter is repeated several times.

tombstone.epitaph:
